Core Views¶

apps.core.views.about(request)¶

Redirects to the store About page

apps.core.views.contact(request)¶

Redirects to the Contact page

apps.core.views.create_store(request)¶

Redirects to the “Create Store” page

apps.core.views.frontpage(request)¶

Redirect to the homepage, rendering the available stores, products, most popular and your recent viewed
